title: The World Moves On cinema slide
creator_credit: John Ford and Fox Film Corporation
credit_line: ACMI has endeavoured to contact the owners of these objects since their deposit in 2015. Unfortunately this has been unsuccessful. We would welcome any information to identify the owners.
brief_description: Two glass sheets: one glass only and the other with slide imagery which has a monochromatic emulsion that has then been hand painted with coloured pigments or dye. TEXT on the slide reads: The World Moves On with Madeline Carroll Franchot Tone Gunn Slide Fox Pictures For general exhibition On the plain glass slide there is worn away handwriting which said: Thurs, Fri, Sat [?XXX] The two sheets of glass are held together using Gunn’s Slide branded tape: Gunn’s Slide, 9 Collins Place Melb. Cent. 2736
